instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3536: What is 820-3536? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Retina 13 inch no audio
threads.message: Hi guys i got a Retina 13 inch with no audio. Apply hardware test via D key gave "display & audio" error. Apple EFI ASD test gave all good. Machine does have no audio, no info shows in "about this mac". Only found a liquid spil on <RESISTOR>R5489</RESISTOR> but didnt look too bad. <CHIP>U6201</CHIP> area looks very clean. Is the audio fail related to display and maybe to <RESISTOR>R5489</RESISTOR>? 3.3v and 1.5v make it to <CHIP>U6201</CHIP>. Any suggestion?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Retina 13 inch no audio
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Retina 13 inch no audio
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Retina 13 inch no audio
threads.message: Check resistors in HDA lines to codec, <RESISTOR>R1310</RESISTOR>-13, <RESISTOR>R6331</RESISTOR>.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3536</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Retina 13 inch no audio
threads.message: Replaced the Audio IC <CHIP>U6201</CHIP> and works again, thanks!
